LanguageData.OE_ModernizationKit.label: modernization kit
LanguageData.OE_ModernizationKit.description: Universal set of components for upgrading Obsidia gear from a simple to an modded version.
LanguageData.OE_PersonaKit.label: armament kit
LanguageData.OE_PersonaKit.description: Advanced set of components bond both Persona and Paragon-class Obsidia weaponry.
LanguageData.OE_DriftersKit.label: Drifters modernization kit
LanguageData.OE_DriftersKit.description: Universal set of components for upgrading Obsidia Drifters Clans gear from a simple to an modded version.
LanguageData.OE_AmmoKit.label: obsidia ammo kit
LanguageData.OE_AmmoKit.description: Universal set of ammo used in Obsidia weaponry.
LanguageData.OE_SyntheriusVehicleCore.label: syntherius drive
LanguageData.OE_SyntheriusVehicleCore.description: This compact core of syntherius circuitry and power cells developed for use in Obsidia vehicles.
LanguageData.OE_MercenaryKit.label: mercenaries modernization kit
LanguageData.OE_MercenaryKit.description: Universal set of highly modified components for building and upgrading Obsidia Mercenary Gangs gear.
LanguageData.OE_CultistKit.label: cultist kit
LanguageData.OE_CultistKit.description: Universal set of strange resources and components from cultists gear. Can be used in cultist technologies.
LanguageData.OE_HeroicKit.label: heroic kit
LanguageData.OE_HeroicKit.description: Universal set of rare resources and components from the heroic gear. Can be used to restore lost heroic technologies.
LanguageData.OE_EGOAmalgamationCore.label: EGO amalgamation core
LanguageData.OE_EGOAmalgamationCore.description: Universal seed infused with advanced symbiotic properties. Can be used to create amalgam technologies.
